item.description: “If you can’t explain it simply, you don’t understand it well enough.” Fan of asking right questions that partner derives core idea by himself. Decision Trees: Decision Trees is much like the “Who am I?” game. If i am asked to explain decision trees to non-statisticans I like to let them play a game of “Who am I?” and let them do guess role with side rule to take as least guesses as possible.
